scripts.link: cd dist/ngx-tour-md-menu && npm link ngx-tour-core && npm link && cd ../.. && npm link ngx-tour-md-menu && cd dist/ngx-tour-ng-bootstrap && npm link ngx-tour-core && npm link && cd ../.. && npm link ngx-tour-ng-bootstrap && cd dist/ngx-tour-console && npm link ngx-tour-core && npm link && cd ../.. && npm link ngx-tour-console
scripts.build:lib:core: ng-packagr -p ng-package-core.json && cd dist/ngx-tour-core && npm link && cd ../.. && npm link ngx-tour-core
scripts.build:lib: npm run build:lib:core && ng-packagr -p ng-package-console.json && ng-packagr -p ng-package-md-menu.json && ng-packagr -p ng-package-ng-bootstrap.json
scripts.pub: npm run pub:lib && npm run pub:demo
scripts.pub:lib: npm run build:lib && cd dist/ngx-tour-core && npm publish && cd ../ngx-tour-console && npm publish && cd ../ngx-tour-ng-bootstrap && npm publish && cd ../ngx-tour-md-menu && npm publish
